attributes.action: All our Police Officers are armed with a gun such as a Glock.
attributes.additional_details:
The Westminster Islamist attack 22nd March 2017  -  the deceased officer was slashed in the throat.

Had the officer had easy access to a gun, he could have shot the assailant.
attributes.background: With an escalating number of killings from lunatic islamists, we MUST protect our Officers  -  and not with a side stick.  OR a tazer.  The time has come to make sure EVERY officer who comes into contact with the Public has his or her own side-arm.
